feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-15T13:54:47.360025Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;我们的 Python 3.13 计划</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/faster-cpython/ideas/blob/main/3.13/README.md</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T12:57:10.668551Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/faster-cpython/ideas/blob/main/3.13/README.md"/>; <作者>; <name>;bratao</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bratao</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //opengraph.githubassets.com/18c1f3080a77002aa7c46b854ccffe7c70caac87307050f6ed26905ca3c160c0/faster-cpython/ideas" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了已为 Python 3.13 完成的基础工作，特别侧重于创建低开销可维护的机器代码生成器。 Python 3.13 的目标是将花在解释器上的时间减少至少 50%，并提高子解释器的并行性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#our-plan-for-python-3-13" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36339777" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Effective Rust</stitle>; <id>;https://www.lurklurk.org/effective-rust/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T10:54 :10.669267Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.lurklurk.org/effective-rust/"/>; <author>; <name>;FL33TW00D</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=FL33TW00D</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;3.13。第 13 条：使用默认实现来最小化所需的特征方法 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#effective-rust" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36338529" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;水泥的未来可能是碳捕集和电气化的结合</stitle>; <id>;https://industrydecarbonization.com/news/cements-future-could- be-a-combination-of-carbon-capture-and-electrification.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T12:54:10.669785Z</updated>; <link href="https://industrydecarbonization.com /news/cements-future-could-be-a-combination-of-carbon-capture-and-electrification.html"/>; <author>; <name>;hannob</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=hannob</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://industrydecarbonization.com/i/cementplant-624.jpg" style="宽度： 220 像素；高度：124 像素；" />;<br />;这篇文章讨论了水泥行业脱碳所面临的挑战，该行业是大量二氧化碳排放的罪魁祸首。它探索了碳捕获和电气化作为减少水泥生产排放的解决方案的潜力。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cement-s-future-could-be-a-combination-of-carbon-capture-and-electrification" target="_blank">;[总结]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36339253" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;愚蠢的程序员宣言</stitle>; <id>;https://hasen.substack.com/p/the-愚蠢的程序员宣言</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T11:54:10.670286Z</updated>; <link href="https://hasen.substack.com/p/the-stupid-programmer-manifesto "/>; <author>; <name>;hsn915</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=hsn915</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages %2Ff60e024a-be4a-494b-a4ba-58fb6094784d_1472x816.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：122px；" />;<br />;这篇文章是关于一个程序员，他承认自己在编程方面很糟糕，并且在各个领域都缺乏智慧。他们使用简单而低效的方法来完成工作。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-stupid-programmer-manifesto" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36338873" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;如何在 40 小时内抓取 25 亿个网页（2012 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://michaelnielsen.org/ddi/how-to-crawl-a-quarter-billion -webpages-in-40-hours/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T07:54:10.670777Z</updated>; <link href="https://michaelnielsen.org/ddi/how-to-crawl -a-quarter-billion-webpages-in-40-hours/"/>; <author>; <name>;swyx</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=swyx</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://michaelnielsen.org/ddi/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/quarter_billion_page_crawl_big_picture.png" style="width: 220px; 高度: 133px;" />;<br />;作者使用 20 个 Amazon EC2 机器实例在不到 40 小时的时间内抓取了超过 2.5 亿个网页。他们想了解抓取一部分 Web 所需的资源，并在这篇文章中描述他们项目的详细信息。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-to-crawl-a-quarter-billion-webpages-in-40-hours-2012" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36337473" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Quake 的闪电枪错误解释</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4gNYTqn3qRc </id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T05:54:10.671265Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4gNYTqn3qRc"/>; <作者>; <名称>;亨宁</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=henning</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<iframe src="//www.youtube. com/embed/4gNYTqn3qRc" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen loading="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#quake-s-lightning-gun-bug-explained" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36315529" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FANN：200 行 Rust 中的向量搜索</stitle>; <id >;https://fennel.ai/blog/vector-search-in-200-lines-of-rust/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T10:54:10.671748Z</更新>; <link href= “https://fennel.ai/blog/vector-search-in-200-lines-of-rust/”/>; <author>; <name>;ingve</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://fennel.ai/blog/content/images/2023/06/data-src- image-050a1e4d-0798-44ef-b0e4-22974a071d5f.png" style="width: 220px; height: 181px;" />;<br />;由于 AI/ML 采用的进步，矢量数据库变得越来越普遍。本文解释了矢量数据库的工作原理，并演示了如何使用 Rust 代码构建一个简单的矢量搜索库。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fann-vector-search-in-200-lines-of-rust" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36338365" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;德国希望将非法药物的质量控制合法化</stitle>; <id>;https://www.spiegel.de/politik/deutschland/arzneimittel-reform-karl -lauterbach-will-drugchecking-bundesweit-einfuehren-a-b642b609-9149-47bc-a013-11476d54e96f</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T11:54:10.672231Z</更新>; <link href="https: //www.spiegel.de/politik/deutschland/arzneimittel-reform-karl-lauterbach-will-drugchecking-bundesweit-einfuehren-a-b642b609-9149-47bc-a013-11476d54e96f"/>; <author>; <name>;tfourb< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tfourb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.prod. www.spiegel.de/images/c59c85b2-cf85-4bb7-9e98-ddd552b17087_w948_r1.778_fpx44.87_fpy50.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;德国的吸毒者将很快能够在全国范围内测试他们的药物成分。联邦卫生部长 Karl Lauterbach (SPD) 宣布计划引入所谓的药物检查，允许联邦各州建立必要的条件。Lauterbach 旨在从《麻醉品法》中取消目前禁止毒品检查的规定，让各联邦州独立确定框架。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#germany -wants-to-legalize-quality-control-of-illegal-drugs" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36338870 " target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="文本">;卫报禁止所有赌博广告</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/society/2023/jun/15/guardian-bans-all-gambling-advertising</id>; <updated>;2023 -06-15T11:54:10.673106Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/society/2023/jun/15/guardian-bans-all-gambling-advertising"/>; <作者>; <name>;CaptainZapp</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=CaptainZapp</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //i.guim.co.uk/img/media/5c6f546284549fb740c0194a3383e8eef64d0321/0_150_4500_2700/master/4500.jpg?width=465&quality=85&dpr=1&s=none" style="width: 220px; height: 132px;" />;<br />;《卫报》宣布在全球范围内禁止赌博广告，理由是担心赌博的成瘾性及其对个人财务和心理健康的负面影响。该禁令将适用于所有人该媒体集团在全球的在线和印刷媒体。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-guardian-bans-all-gambling-advertising" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36338784" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;ESP32-C3 无线探险：物联网综合指南 [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://www. espressif.com/sites/default/files/documentation/ESP32-C3%20Wireless%20Adventure.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T03:54:10.673501Z</更新>; <link href="https:/ /www.espressif.com/sites/default/files/documentation/ESP32-C3%20Wireless%20Adventure.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;sohkamyung</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=sohkamyung</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;这篇文章是 Espressif Systems 关于 ESP32-C3 微控制器 SoC 的一本书的摘要，这是一种具有成本效益的连接解决方​​案设备。本书涵盖与物联网开发相关的各种主题，包括物联网项目开发、硬件设计、无线通信和量产优化。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#esp32-c3-wireless-adventure-a-comprehensive-guide-to-iot-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36336112" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;像变形金刚一样思考 (2021) [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2106.06981</ id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T08:54:10.673887Z</updated>; <link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2106.06981"/>; <author>; <name>;jbay808</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jbay808</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static/ browse/0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：129px；" />;<br />;文章提出了一种用于转换器编码器的计算模型，称为受限访问序列处理语言 (RASP)，它将转换器编码器的基本组件映射为简单的原语。它演示了如何使用 RASP 为 Transformer 学习的任务编写解决方案，以及如何训练 Transformer 以模仿 RASP 解决方案。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#thinking-like-transformers-2021-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36311871" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;本周 Rust 499</stitle>; <id>;https://this-week-in-rust.org/blog/2023/06/14/this-week-in -rust-499/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T07:54:10.674274Z</更新>; <link href="https://this-week-in-rust.org/blog/2023/06 /14/this-week-in-rust-499/"/>; <author>; <name>;unripe_syntax</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=unripe_syntax</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;This Week in Rust 是对 Rust 编程语言的进展和社区的每周总结。它包括构建管道、回归、改进、RFC 和即将到来的 Rust 事件的更新。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#this-week-in-rust-499" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36337500" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;使用 6502 代码的行为驱动开发</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/martinpiper/BDD6502</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T10:54: 10.674660Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/martinpiper/BDD6502"/>; <author>; <name>;ingve</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/eed0d98046697c0c21b23bf5593f9ff34a90f19eb9fc323044e982ddf9836fe8/martinpiper/BDD6502" style="width: 220px ; 高度： 110 像素；" />;<br />;本文讨论了一个允许行为驱动开发 (BDD) 测试与 6502 代码一起使用的项目。该框架支持使用人类可读的自动化测试来测试 6502 代码，有助于减少调试时间并提高代码效率。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#behaviour-driven-development-with-6502-code" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36318281" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;读懂过去，翻翻旧杂志</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nytimes.com/2023/06/13/magazine/old- magazines.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T09:54:10.675045Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nytimes.com/2023/06/13/magazine/old-magazines .html"/>; <author>; <name>;ingve</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <img src="https://static01.nyt.com/images/2023/06/18/magazine/18mag-lor/18mag-lor-articleLarge.jpg?quality=75&auto=webp&disable=upscale" style="宽度: 220 像素；高度：147 像素；" />;<br />;文章讨论了作者对旧杂志的迷恋，以及它们如何充当时间机器，让我们得以一窥过去，挑战我们对历史的先入之见。作者回顾了他们在 1980 年代阅读杂志的个人经历，并强调了从头到尾阅读它们以真正了解当时的文化和背景的重要性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#to-understand-the-past-pick-up-an-old-magazine" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36312232" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;生物声学：寻找其他物种的声音</stitle>; <id>;https://worldsensorium.com/bioacoustics-finding-the-voices- of-other-species/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T10:54:10.675427Z</更新>; <link href="https://worldsensorium.com/bioacoustics-finding-the-voices-of-其他物种/"/>; <author>; <name>;dnetesn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dnetesn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html "<img src="https://worldsensorium.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Nalls-2306.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;文章讨论了数字生物声学领域，该领域使用技术来聆听和分析超出人类听觉范围的植物和动物的声音。这项技术使科学家能够更深入地了解不同的生物及其交流，并有可能彻底改变保护工作。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bioacoustics-finding-the-voices-of-other-species" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36338484" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在司机指责他是种族主义者后，男子被锁在智能家居门外一周</stitle>; <id>;https://www.independent.co.uk/ tech/smart-home-lock-out-amazon-b2358107.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T13:25:10.675817Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.independent.co .uk/tech/smart-home-lock-out-amazon-b2358107.html"/>; <author>; <name>;toss1</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=toss1 </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.independent.co.uk/2023/04/18/11/amazon%20echo%20studio%20.jpg " style="宽度：220px；高度：165px；" />;<br />;一名男子声称，在亚马逊送货司机错误地指责他是种族主义者后，他被锁在智能家居门外一个星期。这起事件使他无法与他的任何智能设备进行交互，并引发了人们对技术公司对其客户设备的控制的担忧。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#man-locked-out-of-smart-home-for-a-week-after-driver-accuses-him-of-being-racist" 目标= "_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36340095" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; < /entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;减少摩擦</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.ceejbot。 com/posts/reduce-friction/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T07:54:10.676203Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.ceejbot.com/posts/reduce-friction/ "/>; <author>; <name>;luu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.ceejbot.com/images/honeycomb-build-trace.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：119px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了在工程组织中减少摩擦的重要性，以及领导者可能对在该领域投入资源的阻力。它强调了减少摩擦的好处，并就如何有效地做到这一点提供了建议。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#reduce-friction" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36306337" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;SETI 科学家制定月球监听站计划</stitle>; <id>;https://www.supercluster.com/editorial/seti-scientists-to-devise-plan-for-lunar-listening-station /</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T00:54:10.676592Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.supercluster.com/editorial/seti-scientists-to-devise-plan-for -lunar-listening-station/"/>; <author>; <name>;yk</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yk</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;这篇文章讨论了在月球背面建立一个专门的 SETI 天文台的可能性。研究人员正在努力为这项任务定义技术规范，这将为正式的 A 阶段研究提供信息。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#seti-scientists-to-devise-plan-for-lunar-listening-station" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36334912" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;构建一个自己开源的平台</stitle>; <id>;https://zed.dev/blog/open-sourcing-zed-on -zed</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T08:54:10.676991Z</updated>; <link href="https://zed.dev/blog/open-sourcing-zed-on-zed"/>; <author>; <name>;signa11</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=signa11</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://zed.dev/img/post/open-sourcing-zed-on-zed/open-sourcing-zed-on-zed.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：98px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了关于代码的高效对话的重要性，以及开放公共编码通道以扩展此功能的计划。目标是让人们在编写代码时可以收听、观看和与团队聊天，并最终将平台开源。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#building-a-platform-that-open-sources-itself" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36337828" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;频道网络试图让 YouTube 充满支持博尔索纳罗的内容</stitle>; <id>;https://phys.org/news/2023-06-network- channels-saturate-youtube-pro-bolsonaro.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T11:54:10.677376Z</updated>; <link href="https://phys.org/news/2023-06 -network-channels-saturate-youtube-pro-bolsonaro.html"/>; <author>; <name>;belter</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=belter</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://scx1.b-cdn.net/csz/news/800a/2023/network-of-channels-tr.jpg" style="宽度：220 像素；高度：146 像素；" />;<br />;专家们已经确定了在 2022 年巴西大选期间用支持博尔索纳罗的内容使 YouTube 的推荐算法饱和的协同努力。一个由影响者驱动的视频网络，通过提及、标签、采访和剪辑进行推广，极大地促进了推荐的政治视频和频道的数量。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#network-of-channels-tried-to-saturate-youtube-with-pro-bolsonaro-content" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36338902" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;11 年托管 SaaS 的经验教训</stitle>; <id>;https://ghiculescu.substack.com/p /11-years-of-hosting-a-saas</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T05:54:10.677759Z</更新>; <link href="https://ghiculescu.substack.com/p/ 11-years-of-hosting-a-saas"/>; <author>; <name>;ghiculescu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ghiculescu</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1200,h_600,c_fill,f_jpg,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep,g_auto/https%3A%2F% 2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fb51ff6cc-04f6-43a5-be58-fa15ae72214c_1560x500.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：92px；" />;<br />;本文反映了作者运行 Web 应用程序 11 年的经验，讨论了部署、托管和基础架构管理方面的挑战和经验教训。它涵盖了作者从使用 Heroku 到迁移到 Digital Ocean 和最终迁移到 AWS 的旅程，强调了一路上的困难和错误。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lessons-learned-from-11-years-of-hosting-a-saas" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36336748" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;布局引擎的冲突驱动综合</stitle>; <id>;https://dl.acm.org/doi/pdf/10.1145/3591246 </id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T11:54:10.678159Z</更新>; <link href="https://dl.acm.org/doi/pdf/10.1145/3591246"/>; <作者>; <名称>;luu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;$ "s / x 0 - txymql）。 dijknrefwzchuvabopg, srntioaeuqyzm <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#conflict-driven-synthesis-for-layout-engines" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36319025" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;1906 年旧金山地震的目击者描述</stitle>; <id>;https://publicdomainreview.org/collection/san-francisco-calamity</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T06:54:10.678553Z</更新>; <link href="https://publicdomainreview.org/collection/san-francisco-calamity"/>; <author>; <name>;samclemens</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=samclemens</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://publicdomainreview.org/static/ pdr-circles-66b0b7b42092975f0d5502ab646d9fa8.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;这篇文章描述了当局如何在 1906 年旧金山地震期间使用炸药作为灭火技术。尽管效果有限，但他们继续使用炸药炸毁城市的大部分地区，包括范内斯大道上一英里半的维多利亚式房屋。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#eyewitness-accounts-of-the-1906-san-francisco-earthquake" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36315978" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;帮助运营 Megaupload 的人在新西兰被判入狱</stitle>; <id>;https://abcnews.go.com/Technology/wireStory/2 -men-helped-run-popular-pirating-website-megaupload-100099005</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T11:54:10.678934Z</updated>; <link href="https://abcnews.go. com/Technology/wireStory/2-men-helped-run-popular-pirating-website-megaupload-100099005"/>; <author>; <name>;jacquesm</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=jacquesm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://s.abcnews.com/images/International/wiredory_a858f2a77b4eebf912711e818d6400f5_12x5_992.jpg" style="width: 220px ; 高度：92px;" />;<br />;两名协助运营盗版网站 Megaupload 的男子被新西兰法院判处两年多监禁。这些人承认自己是犯罪集团的一员，并通过欺骗使艺术家蒙受损失。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#men-who-helped-run-megaupload-sentenced-to-prison-in-new-zealand" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36338979" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;关于 John Wick 的缓慢生产力</stitle>; <id>;https://calnewport.com/on-the-slow -productivity-of-john-wick/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T01:54:10.679318Z</updated>; <link href="https://calnewport.com/on-the-slow-productivity -of-john-wick/"/>; <author>; <name>;lawgimenez</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lawgimenez</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://calnewport.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/wick-640-px.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：113px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了 Cal Newport 于 2007 年推出的“Study Hacks”博客，该博客获得了大量读者，涵盖技术、生产力和深入生活在一个分心的世界等主题。 2022 年，Cal 还推出了一个名为 TheDeepLife.com 的新门户，提供与深度生命运动相关的更多内容。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#on-the-slow-productivity-of-john-wick" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36335104" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;人在 2021 年发现了加州大学伯克利分校的骨架</stitle>; <id>;https://www.berkeleyscanner.com/2023/06/12/uc-berkeley-crime /uc-berkeley-skeleton-found-2021-clark-kerr-human-remains/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T02:54:10.679701Z</更新>; <link href="https://www .berkeleyscanner.com/2023/06/12/uc-berkeley-crime/uc-berkeley-skeleton-found-2021-clark-kerr-human-remains/"/>; <author>; <name>;yawnxyz</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yawnxyz</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.berkeleyscanner.com/content/ images/size/w256h256/format/jpeg/2022/09/The-Berkeley-Scanner_Icon_Color-1.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;承包商两年前在加州大学伯克利分校一座废弃的大楼里发现了骨骼残骸，并向加州大学的一位主管报告，但该主管没有通知警方。由于对未采取行动感到沮丧，工人们于今年 1 月向加州大学警察局报告了遗体，使此案进入公众视野。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#man-found-uc-berkeley-skeleton-in-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36335581" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;GPT-4 的原生 JSON 输出</stitle>; <id>;https://yonom.substack.com/p/native-json-output-from-gpt -4</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T19:54:10.680081Z</更新>; <link href="https://yonom.substack.com/p/native-json-output-from-gpt- 4"/>; <author>; <name>;yonom</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yonom</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;< img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic% 2Fimages%2Fbcf4d45c-57cd-4dca-b2d3-2f173af25df0_1600x1024.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：141px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了在集成 LLM（大型语言模型）以生成 JSON 等结构化数据时使用函数调用。这项新功能简化了流程，并允许来自 GPT 调用的更可靠的 JSON 响应。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#native-json-output-from-gpt-4" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36330972" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我在 21 小时内启动了 Linux 293k 次</stitle>; <id>;https://rwmj.wordpress.com/2023/06/14/i-booted-linux- 292612次/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-14T14:54:10.680468Z</更新>; <link href="https://rwmj.wordpress.com/2023/06/14/i-booted- linux-292612-times/"/>; <author>; <name>;jandeboevrie</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jandeboevrie</uri>; </author>; <content type= "html">;<img src="https://s0.wp.com/i/blank.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px；" />;<br />;而且只用了21个小时。 Linux 6.4 有一个在引导时挂起的错误，但可能只有千分之一的引导（如果出于某种原因使用 Intel 硬件，则更少见）。令我惊讶的是，没有人注意到这一点，但我确实注意到了，因为我们使用 libguestfs 的 nbdkit 测试是随机的…… <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-booted-linux-293k-times -in-21-hours" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36325986" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;启动 HN: Credal.ai (YC W23) – Data Safety for Enterprise AI</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36326525</id>; <updated>;2023-06-14T15:54:10.680887Z</updated >; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36326525"/>; <author>; <name>;r_thambapillai</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=r_thambapillai</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Credal.ai provides a Chat UI and APIs that enforce data safety measures for companies using language models with their corporate data. They address security and privacy barriers related to data control, visibility, and access controls. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-credal-ai-yc-w23-data-safety-for-enterprise-ai" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36326525" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
